page.title: 19FUN SPORTS DAY IN E.SWINDON
page.content: After the real competitive sports for local Primary Schools at Nythe, we held our first{Non-competitive Fun {Sports Day. This tended to upset the really competitive children who found it difficult to participate without having to win at all costs. We had{problem solving,}making tanks out of 'Coke' cans, rubber bands and canes. A{treasure hunt}type of game was organised with a message to be found by each team. There was{mini_football, French {cricket, rounders,}and lots of things to do with a{parachute and plastic {football!}We made paper planes, {painted on the pavement}and had lots of problems with hoops and precise verbal instructions. In fact we had a tremendous time even though nobody actually won !
